title: Blittzen My Favorite People Call Me Uncle Mens T-Shirt
features: This item is proudly printed by Blittzen in the USA using quality garments sourced from US based distributors. If you would like to see more of our items feel free to search Blittzen on the Amazon marketplace.
The best care instructions for this garment are to wash it inside out in cold water and hang dry to preserve the life of the design.
Please refer to the sizing chart in the additional photos provided. This will show you how the garment is measured so you can accurately select the best size.
This adult mens crewneck short sleeve t-shirt is made of 100% cotton (except for Light Gray which is a 90-10 cotton-polyester blend) for a light and comfortable fit.

Regardless of the occasion (Christmas, Father's Day, birth of the first child or the old man's birthday), it's always the right time to let you dad, daddy, father, papa, papi or whatever name you call him know he's loved and appreciated. Show your love and appreciation with this timeless and trendy shirt.
